pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Analysis of Clumped Isotope Datasets // Simulating synthetic clumped isotope dataset, fitting linear regression models under Bayesian and non-Bayesian frameworks, and generating temperature reconstructions for the same two approaches. Please note that models implemented in this package are described in Roman-Palacios et al. (2021) doi:10.1002/essoar.10507995.1.
